name: Velvet Judgement
description:
Team Name

Paperboard Studios

In Ancient China, the gods decide to punish humans by sending a great flood. There was no place to live, other than the summit of tall mountains. The Emperor appoints Gun to control the flood. Gun prepares his army, ready to steal Xirang from the gods. It is said that Xirang, is a magical substance that continuously self expands as soil. But Zhurong, the god of fire and protector of the Xirang, does not let humans get their way.
